topic.title: DITA Open Toolkit: General DITA Publishing and Data Processing
topic.shortdesc: The DITA Open Toolkit provides general facilities for generating publishable outputs from DITA source: HTML, PDF, EPUB, etc.

body.p: The is the primary open-source framework for generating deliverables from DITA source. It is widely used by the DITA community and integrated with most DITA-aware tools.
